import { Card, Col, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; // hooks import { usePageTitle } from '../../../hooks'; const EmbedVideo = () => { // set pagetitle usePageTitle({ title: 'Video', breadCrumbItems: [ { path: '/base-ui/embedvideo', label: 'Base UI', }, { path: '/base-ui/embedvideo', label: 'Video', active: true, }, ], }); return (

Responsive embed video 21:9

Use class .ratio-21x9

{/* 21:9 aspect ratio */}

Responsive embed video 16:9

Use class .ratio-16x9

{/* 16:9 aspect ratio */}

Responsive embed video 4:3

Use class .ratio-4x3

{/* 4:3 aspect ratio */}

Responsive embed video 1:1

Use class .ratio-1x1

{/* 1:1 aspect ratio */}
); }; export default EmbedVideo;
